Sentencas: Onboard diesel reformer integrated with solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) unit offers potential for high energy conversion efficiency and low emission levels on seagoing transport, avoiding cost associated with hydrogen storage and infrastructure.
Titulo: Hydrogen-rich gas production by steam reforming of n-dodecane Part I: Catalytic activity of Pt/CeO2 catalysts in optimized bed configuration

Sentencas: However, the development of active and stable liquid hydrocarbon reforming catalyst still remains one of the major technological barriers for fuel-cell-based auxiliary power., unit (APU) applications.
Titulo: Hydrogen-rich gas production by steam reforming of n-dodecane Part I: Catalytic activity of Pt/CeO2 catalysts in optimized bed configuration

Sentencas: In this paper, the activity and stability of Pt/CeO2 catalysts were investigated towards the steam reforming (SR) of n-dodecane, used as surrogate fuel for marine diesel.
Titulo: Hydrogen-rich gas production by steam reforming of n-dodecane Part I: Catalytic activity of Pt/CeO2 catalysts in optimized bed configuration

Sentencas: Pt-based catalysts (0.6-2.3 wt.% of metal loading) were prepared by Solution Combustion Synthesis (SCS) method and characterized by XRD, N-2-physisorption, CO-chemisorption, TPR, TPO and TEM techniques.
Titulo: Hydrogen-rich gas production by steam reforming of n-dodecane Part I: Catalytic activity of Pt/CeO2 catalysts in optimized bed configuration

Sentencas: Tests were performed at various process parameters, namely steam-to-carbon molar ratio (S/C = 2-3), space velocity (GHSV = 16,000-32,000 h(-1)) and time-on-stream.
Titulo: Hydrogen-rich gas production by steam reforming of n-dodecane Part I: Catalytic activity of Pt/CeO2 catalysts in optimized bed configuration

Sentencas: An optimized temperature-controlled (500-800 degrees C) bed configuration was adopted in,order to avoid carbon/coke deposition due to n-dodecane cracking phenomena.
Titulo: Hydrogen-rich gas production by steam reforming of n-dodecane Part I: Catalytic activity of Pt/CeO2 catalysts in optimized bed configuration

Sentencas: Superior chemical-physical properties of 0.6 wt.% Pt/CeO2 system positively affect the SR performance.
Titulo: Hydrogen-rich gas production by steam reforming of n-dodecane Part I: Catalytic activity of Pt/CeO2 catalysts in optimized bed configuration

Sentencas: Pt-based catalyst showed catalytic activity comparable with that of the commercial Rh/ZDC (Rh/Zirconia-doped-Ceria).
Titulo: Hydrogen-rich gas production by steam reforming of n-dodecane Part I: Catalytic activity of Pt/CeO2 catalysts in optimized bed configuration

Sentencas: total n-dodecane conversion and high H-2 concentration (73%, dry and N-2-free basis) were obtained at S/C = 2.5 and GHSV = 16,000 h(-1).
Titulo: Hydrogen-rich gas production by steam reforming of n-dodecane Part I: Catalytic activity of Pt/CeO2 catalysts in optimized bed configuration

Sentencas: Stable catalytic activity was found under start-up and shutdown cycles for 50 h of time-on-stream.
Titulo: Hydrogen-rich gas production by steam reforming of n-dodecane Part I: Catalytic activity of Pt/CeO2 catalysts in optimized bed configuration

Sentencas: Restored catalytic performance was obtained under activity regeneration cycles evaluated in more stressful conclitibns (S/C = 1.5; GHSV = 40,000 h(-1)).
Titulo: Hydrogen-rich gas production by steam reforming of n-dodecane Part I: Catalytic activity of Pt/CeO2 catalysts in optimized bed configuration

Sentencas: This preliminary study was finalized to a diesel fuel processor design.
Titulo: Hydrogen-rich gas production by steam reforming of n-dodecane Part I: Catalytic activity of Pt/CeO2 catalysts in optimized bed configuration
